Detailed Description

This information is provided to notify application about network events.

Definition at line 294 of file zdo.h.

Field Documentation

uint8_t ZDO_MgmtNwkUpdateNotf_t::status

The parameter shows the notification status and can be: ZDO_SUCCESS_STATUS, ZDO_INVALID_PARAMETERS_STATUS, ZDO_FAIL_STATUS, ZDO_RESPONSE_WAIT_TIMEOUT_STATUS, ZDO_NETWORK_STARTED_STATUS, ZDO_NETWORK_LEFT_STATUS, ZDO_NETWORK_LOST_STATUS, ZDO_CHILD_JOINED_STATUS, ZDO_CHILD_REMOVED_STATUS, ZDO_USER_DESCRIPTOR_UPDATE_STATUS, ZDO_STATIC_ADDRESS_CONFLICT_STATUS, ZDO_NWK_UPDATE_STATUS
